short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Support arranging Trello lists into horizontal swimlanes. To start a new swimlane, just add | or a swimmer emoji to a list's header.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NOTE: THIS EXTENSION IS NO LONGER BEING MAINTAINED! Instead, please use the "Trello-Groups" extension at https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/hppnbiahgpfneemhjkpmfdfloombkmnk

Trello-Groups has taken the functionality from this extension, and then updated it and expanded on it.
